Trial_Design.evidence: In patients enrolled in the COSS trial

Participants.evidence: patients with and without recurrent hemispheric syndromes associated with AICAO

Intervention.evidence: randomization into surgical vs medical groups

Objective.evidence: To compare clinical outcomes and efficacy of EC-IC bypass surgery

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was all stroke and death from randomization through 30 d and ipsilateral ischemic stroke within 2 yr.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of 195 randomized participants, 100 were rHEMI+ (50 in each group).

Number_Analysed.evidence: Baseline characteristics between rHEMI+ and rHEMIâˆ’ participants were similar

Result_Outcome.evidence: no significant differences in occurrence of the primary endpoint between nonsurgical and surgical participants in rHEMI+ (26.3% vs 22.4%, P = .660)
